info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 12 at 2:55PM MST until December 13 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Yuma County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on treacherous road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. High winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
